argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lmodvnegid.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lmodvnegid.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lmodvnegid.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lmodvnegid.n | |- N = ( invg ` W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_lmodgrp | |- ( W e. LMod -> W e. Grp ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_grprinv | |- ( ( W e. Grp /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .+ ( N ` X ) ) = .0. ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .+ ( N ` X ) ) = .0. ) |
